mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into lottery (code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content, type1_num, type1_money, type2_num, type2_money, type3_num, type3_money, lottery_date) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{b1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{b2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sales,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poolmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type1Num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type1Money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type2Num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type2Money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type3Num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type3Money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lotteryDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update lottery set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r1 = #{r1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r2 = #{r2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r3 = #{r3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r4 = #{r4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r5 = #{r5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r6 = #{r6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b1 = #{b1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, b2 = #{b2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, poolmoney = #{poolmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type1_num = #{type1Num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type1_money = #{type1Money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type2_num = #{type2Num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type2_money = #{type2Money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type3_num = #{type3Num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type3_money = #{type3Money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lottery_date = #{lotteryDate,jdbcType=DATE} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content, type1_num, type1_money, type2_num, type2_money, type3_num, type3_money, lottery_date from lottery where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content, type1_num, type1_money, type2_num, type2_money, type3_num, type3_money, lottery_date from lottery
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into lottery (code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, r6, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content, type1_num, type1_money, type2_num, type2_money, type3_num, type3_money, lottery_date) values
